title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 04 August 2012 - XWiki
content:
01:15 <ssavi> has quit  
01:26 <ssavi> has joined #xwiki  
02:01 <polx> has quit  
02:05 <ssavi> sdumitriu: Hi  
02:11 <ssavi> I'm working on solr search component. I'm looking for a way to make ajax calls and display the details and progress of the search in the front end. Can you point me to some documentation on how to use it with velocity?  
02:17 <sdumitriu> ssavi: Hi  
02:17 <sdumitriu> Are you sure it's needed?  
02:17 <sdumitriu> Search shouldn't take that long  
02:23 <ssavi> sdumitriu: This is for reporting the progress of indexing  
02:23 <sdumitriu> Ah, indexing  
02:24 <sdumitriu> Yes, that could take a long time  
02:24 <sdumitriu> OK, an example of something similar is the installation progress displayed in the extension manager  
02:27 <ssavi> sdumitriu: Thanks a lot. I'm looking at it :)  
02:29 <sdumitriu> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-extension/xwiki-platform-extension-ui/src/main/resources/XWiki/ExtensionManagerMacros.xml
